sentences.english: Interest tax and measures to reduce the possibility of bringing out the market?

sentences.english: Part one is the theoretical research on the fiscal interest-subsidy of the student loan.

sentences.english: The provision of investment subsidies and interest discount funds shall be gratuitous.

sentences.english: It shall also, pursuant to the procedures for budgetary management, distribute the budget of interest-subsidy funds for the project concerned.
sentences.chinese: 并按照预算管理程序要求，下达项目贴息资金预算。
